title: Liam Armitage - Technical Artist
name: Liam Armitage
intro: I'm Liam Armitage, a Technical Artist with a passion for combining art and technology to inspire and spark creativity. Set to graduate from the Rochester Institute of Technology in December 2024, I'll be earning a Bachelor of Science in Game Design and Development.
skills: My skills include a variety of artistic tools, programming languages, and project management techniques, such as Maya, Unreal Engine, Unity, Blender, ZBrush, C++, C#, Javascript, Python, and more. As a bilingual English and Japanese speaker, I excel at communication and collaboration, allowing me to work effectively within diverse teams.
mission: Continuously learning and incorporating new technologies into my creative process, I strive to express myself through various mediums and inspire others just as games and movies have inspired me.
